data.title: Accessibility
data.meta_description: NXP is committed to providing a website that is accessible to a wide range of visitors. We continuously strive to improve our features so that content can be accessed regardless of ability.
data.text:
NXP is committed to providing a website that is accessible to a wide range of visitors. We continuously strive to improve our features so that content can be accessed regardless of ability.

Text Size

You can adjust text size by utilizing the browser’s zoom feature. In many web browsers this can be accessed by selecting View, Zoom In, Zoom out or by pressing Ctrl + and Ctrl - on your keyboard (⌘ + or ⌘ - for Mac).

Images and Alternative Text

Many images on our website possess alternative text (alt text) which can be read aloud by screen readers or Braille displays. The alt text conveys the same essential information as the image, serving the same purpose.

Color Contrast

Our text and background color combinations provide sufficient contrast for easier readability.

Links

Links are written to be clear and concise, making them easier to scan visually and using a screen reader. Links that open in a new window will be indicated with a NE arrow ( ) to inform the user.

We also feature large touch targets on buttons and links for easier clickability.

Downloads

We use PDF files to preserve the look of original documents. To open and view PDF files, download the latest free version of Adobe Acrobat Reader. Acrobat also publishes information on accessing PDF documents using screen readers. To open and view ZIP files, download the latest extraction software from Corel. The software allows ZIP files to be uncompressed so that contents can be viewed.

JavaScript

Our website is optimized for use with JavaScript enabled. However, where JavaScript or other scripts are used for navigation or functionality, an alternative mechanism has been put in place in case your browser does not support these scripts. Find instructions to enable Javascript.

Supported Browsers

Desktop Chrome Firefox Internet Explorer Microsoft Edge Safari 71+ 78+ Discontinued support 18+ 14+

Mobile Android iOS Safari 5.1+ 12+

Videos

Videos are delivered in a way that ensures an optimal experience on different devices and bandwidth.

Videos hosted by NXP.com are compatible with the browsers and operating systems described in the table above. Depending on the version and preferences of each browser, our video engine may rely on the standard built-in HTML5 player or plug-ins such as Flash to play the video.

Screen Reader

Our site is accessible through screen readers through HTML ARIA labels.

For assistance using your screen reader you can check the steps to activate it whether you are using Windows or Mac.
